package.name: face_detector
package.description: Face detector using the [BlazeFace Mediapipe model](https://storage.googleapis.com/mediapipe-assets/MediaPipe%20BlazeFace%20Model%20Card%20(Short%20Range).pdf) (with both CPU and TPU delegates) written in C++; - Plain C/C++ implementation with minimal dependencies (Tensorflow Lite + OpenCV) - Google MediaPipe models without the Mediapipe framework - Support for Coral Edge TPU - Runs on ARM as well (Tested on RPI 3,4 and 5)
